name: Hā-ye do-češm #21
description: The 31st letter of the modern Persian alphabet. Since the script is cursive, the appearance of a letter changes depending on its position: isolated, initial (joined on the left), medial (joined on both sides) and final (joined on the right) of a word. This work is a representation of the initial form for the letter, which is influenced with more parameters than just its appearance in the word.
